supervisor.model.tallier

Class Tallier

  • java.lang.Object
    • supervisor.model.tallier.Tallier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITallier

    public class Tallier
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITallier
    Temporary class for tallying votes as they are seen (unencrypted) on the network

      • challenged

        public void challenged(ASExpression nonce)
        Description copied from interface: ITallier
        Called to indicate that a voting transaction is being challenged. This should result in the destruction of the ballot in the tallier.
